snippet: After government inquiries and health complaints, the maker of Brazilian Blowout agreed to warn consumers that its product emits formaldehyde gas.
lead_paragraph: After government inquiries and health complaints, the maker of Brazilian Blowout agreed to warn consumers that its product emits formaldehyde gas.

headline.seo: Brazilian Blowout Agrees to a $4.5 Million Settlement
headline.main: Maker of a Hair-Straightening Product Settles Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Maker of a Hair-Straightening Product Settles Lawsuit
